import React from 'react'; import './FadeSlider.css' import Slider from "react-slick"; const FadeSlider = () => { const fadeImages = [ "images/Slide1.jpeg", "images/Slide2.jpeg", "images/Slide3.jpeg" ]; const settings = { dots: true, fade: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, }; return ( <>
) } export default FadeSlider; {/*
*/}
